meanings.sent1: The mousiest kitten in the litter always hid behind its siblings.
meanings.sent2: She was the mousiest student in class, barely speaking up during discussions.
meanings.sent3: The mousiest squirrel in the park was too scared to approach the picnic area.
meanings.sent4: Her mousiest nature made her blend into the background like a shadow.
meanings.sent5: The mousiest deer cautiously peeked out from the bushes, afraid of the open field.

meanings.definition: resembling a mouse in size or behavior
meanings.sent1: The mousiest toy in the collection was a tiny mouse figurine.
meanings.sent2: The new student had the mousiest movements, scurrying from one desk to another.
meanings.sent3: The mousiest car on the road turned out to be surprisingly fast in the race.
meanings.sent4: Her room was decorated with the mousiest decorations, including mouse-shaped pillows.
meanings.sent5: The mousiest child in the group loved cheese just like a mouse would.

meanings.sent1: She was the mousiest of all her siblings, always preferring quiet activities.
meanings.sent2: The mousiest outfit she owned was a gray sweater that resembled a mouse's fur.
meanings.sent3: The mousiest cake at the party turned out to be the most delicious one.
meanings.sent4: Her voice was the mousiest in the choir, but it carried a sweet melody.
meanings.sent5: The mousiest flower in the garden bloomed into the most vibrant color.
